pr_title: NMS-12279: Cleanup interfaces tagged for flows

timeline.bodyText: Can we do both ingress egress in a single transaction?
timeline.author: j-white

timeline.bodyText:
(Beside the missing final ...) a TreeMap used for two variables seems to be overkill. There are cases of conditional handling below anyways.
A Map#get() and Map#put() compared to reading and writing two variable seems to be wrong.
If we decide to keep the Map, there is EnumMap...
timeline.author: fooker

timeline.bodyText: new Date().getTime() can be replaced by System.currentTimeMillis()
timeline.author: fooker
